headline: Ask HN: Has anyone been scammed by Samsung?
description:
I placed an order (#US338278430) for 870 QVO SATA III 2.5" SSD 8TB (total amount: $816.19). However I received 870 QVO SATA III 2.5" SSD 1TB, an item which I did not order. The item sent by Samsung is only a 1TB SSD ($109.99). In plain English: Samsung charged me for a product advertised as containing 8 terrabytes of storage capacity and costing $816.19, but they sent me a product containing only 1 terabyte of storage capacity and costing $109.99.

They are refusing to issue a refund. What would you do in my shoes?
